name: St. Peter Julian Eymard

locations.description: Founder of the Congregation of the Blessed Sacrament

summary: Peter Julian Eymard was a French priest and founder of the Congregation of the Blessed Sacrament, a religious order dedicated to promoting devotion to the Eucharist. He also founded the Servants of the Blessed Sacrament for women. He was a prolific writer on Eucharistic spirituality and worked to establish perpetual adoration chapels. He is the patron saint of Eucharistic adoration.
